title: Waffles
instructions: Mix milk with vinegar. Mix with 3 large egg yolks, beaten. Mix 2c flour, 1 tsp baking soda, 2 Tbsp corn starch. Gradually add to milk mixture. Add 5 Tbsp melted butter. Whip 3 egg whites to stiff peaks. Gradually fold into mix. Add 1/4 tsp cinnamon, 1/3 c sugar, 1 tsp vanilla. Cook in waffle iron.
